title: low frame rates after the update
body: after the latest update there are some frame drop issues for players playing on macbook pro with intel hd4000 graphic card , i know its very old grachic card but it was enough to run the game before the update , but after the latest update there are frame drops at certain group fights in the game , please help

replies.body: There could be other settings getting in the way, so make sure to go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out some possibilities.  If the issues persists, though, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll work with you individually on this one.
